programme.title: Uncut: Tete v Butler
programme.desc: A packed-out Echo Arena, and a whole host of Liverpool's finest fighters- Paul Butler headlines against South African Zolani Tete in a bid to become a two-weight world champion. The whole night uncut..(n)

programme.title: Gomez v Kamegai
programme.desc: The Fantasy Springs Resort Casino in Palm Springs will be home to a gruelling 10 round battle between two big punching light-middleweights as tough Alfonso Gomez faces Japan's Yoshihiro Kamegai..(n)

programme.title: Boxing Matters
programme.desc: Alex Steedman presents this show on BoxNation. Every time a big fight's coming up, Alex and guests will preview the action with exclusive interviews from the fighters. Why? Because Boxing Matters..(n)

programme.title: Fighting Spirit
programme.desc: MMA Season 3: World Clash Tour is a global discovery of Mixed Martial Arts. A mix of every kind of MMA from events around the world..(n)

programme.title: BoxNation Presents
programme.desc: BoxNation Presents- Relative unknown Harry Simon takes on Ronald 'Winky' Wright for his WBO light middleweight belt at the Carousel Casino in South Africa. A great fight, with a peculiar conclusion..(n)

programme.title: Uncut: Stiverne v Wilder
programme.desc: Bermane Stiverne takes on Deontay Wilder- the first world heavyweight title fight in Las Vegas since 2006. Stiverne is the champion, but Wilder boasts a 32 win, 32 KO record. The whole night uncut..(n)

programme.title: Magee v Markussen
programme.desc: Ireland's Brian Magee defends his World Super Middleweight title against the big punching Dane Rudy Markussen in Copenhagen..(n)

programme.title: Uncut: Crawford v Gamboa
programme.desc: America's Terence Crawford takes on Cuban Olympic gold medallist Yuriorkis Gamboa in his hometown of Omaha, Nebraska. This was a pulsating match for the WBO lightweight title. The whole night Uncut..(n)

programme.title: Uncut: Ormond v Flanagan
programme.desc: No love lost here as Terry 'Turbo' Flanagan took on Stephen 'The Rock' Ormond in a WBO lightweight world title eliminator on Valentine's Day. It promised to be a barnstormer. The whole night uncut..(n)

programme.title: Uncut Broner v Maidana
